summary: THE GEAR SHIFT INDICATOR IS GIVING FALSE READINGS.  DRIVER HAS NO CLUE TO WHAT GEAR THE VEHICLE IS IN.   *AK   THE SHIFT INDICATOR DID NOT WORK MOST OF THE TIME.  THE VEHICLE WOULD DRIVE BUT IT WAS ACTUALLY IN REVERSE THE INDICATORS WERE IN NEUTRAL BUT THE TRANSMISSION WAS IN DRIVE.   *SCC. THE CONSUMER LEARNED THERE WAS A RECALL ON THE MATTER, HOWEVER THE RECALL DID NOT APPLY TO HIS VEHICLE, EVEN THOUGH THERE WAS A RECALL ON THE SAME MAKE AND MODEL.  *JB
